ADTFStreamingLibrary

Automotive Data and Time-Triggered Framework Streaming Library


See Whats new in 2.9.0? and the Change Log

The ADTF Streaming Library is a dynamic Library package to provide a possibility accessing the ADTF DAT File (IndexedFile). The DAT File is a streambased container to serialize and deserialize binary data.

For a more detailed specification on the DAT File see the current ADTF DAT File Format Specification in this installation (in doc/DATFileFormatSpecification.pdf).

ADTF Streaming Library Constraints

The ADTF Streaming Library will give you the possibility to (read/write) access a DAT File only. Using this library to stream data within an Online Simulation Environment will fail. This library has NO performance optimization for time critical requirements! To do so use ADTF !

ADTF Streaming Library Programming Example

See the documentation on ADTF Streaming Library Programming Examples.
